description:
As the winners of the Cho-Tokyo Championship head to the Japan Tournament, they take a look back at their adventures so far. Their destination holds many secrets, including the mysterious Dragon Force and a new enemy, Doctor Gara.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Full Steam Ahead! To The Japan Representative Invitational Island!
Yousorou! Nihon Daihyou Senbatsu no Shima e!!
ヨーソロォ! 日本代表選抜の島へ!!
